qas.question: As of 2008, geothermal power development was underway in more than how many countries?
What is one new technology attributed to the growth of geothermal power?
What is operational in the USA, Australia, Germany, France and The United Kingdom?
As of 2008, geothermal power development wasn't underway in more than how many countries?
As of 2008, geothermal power development was underway in less than how many countries?
What is one old technology attributed to the growth of geothermal power?
What is not operational in the USA, Australia, Germany, France and The United Kingdom?

plausible_answers.text: USA, Australia, Germany, France, and The United Kingdom

qas.question: Where are demonstration eggs taking place?

context: As of 2008[update], geothermal power development was under way in more than <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>40<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/> countries, partially attributable to the development of new technologies, such as <a1_0><b5_0>Enhanced Geothermal Systems<b5_0/><a1_0/>. The development of binary cycle power plants and improvements in drilling and extraction technology may enable enhanced geothermal systems over a much greater geographical range than "traditional" Geothermal systems. <a2_0><b6_0>Demonstration EGS projects<b6_0/><a2_0/> are operational in the <b7_0>USA, Australia, Germany, France, and The United Kingdom<b7_0/>.
